description:
To my BIPOC sisters, and brothers I see you.⁣
⁣
I decided… instead of trying to say, do, or be the right thing… ⁣
⁣
THIS was my time to LISTEN.⁣
⁣
I watched your stories, your videos, I read your posts.I reached out to many of your privately, I checked in, I ASKED! ⁣
⁣
Many of you expressed that you feel a PRESSURE of needing to be a PILLAR right now, and truthfully hasn’t found the courage to speak up…⁣
⁣
I want you to KNOW that your voice has been so appreciated right now. Know that people like myself have been SO DEEPLY touched by your stories and sharing.⁣
⁣
⁣
This is a time for us to come into deeper UNITY. This is a time for the unheard voices to be heard. This is a time for us to recognize our blind spots. TO BE EDUCATED!!⁣
⁣
This is a time for us to OPEN UP OUR HEARTS AND COME INTO A DEEPER STATE OF LOVE FOR ONE ANOTHER.⁣
⁣
Listen… I KNOW that there have been generations upon generations of racial divide, hatred, and violence. And this is NOT OK. ⁣
⁣
WE NEED TO LOOK AT THIS. WE NEED TO DIVE INTO THE SHADOWS OF RACISM.⁣
⁣
However, I feel that there is something EVEN DEEPER going on that is important we also address. ⁣
⁣
I’m not claiming to be an expert.. I’m not claiming to know what the truth is…⁣
⁣
However I’ve seen evidence of bricks being delivered to where they know there will be mass gatherings⁣
⁣
I’ve seen evidence of people being hired to go to these protests and intentionally cause harm ⁣
⁣
I’ve seen evidence that this has been a ploy to divide us even further.⁣
⁣
What I do know that TRUTH is a FREQUENCY.⁣
⁣
And I am tired of being lied to by the media, by the governments, and by the “trusted sources.”⁣
⁣
Humanity it is time for us to CLAIM THAT WE WANT TRUTH AND WE WANT IT NOW.⁣
⁣
It’s time for us to CLAIM OUR OWN SOVEREIGN GOD SELF.⁣
⁣
It’s time to say WE DO NOT CONSENT TO MASS MANIPULATION, LIES, AND PROGRAMMING OF SEPARATION AND DIVIDE OF ANY SORT.⁣
⁣
HUMANITY.⁣
⁣
THIS IS THE TIME WE HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR.⁣
⁣
THIS IS THE GREATEST OPPORTUNITY WE HAVE TO CREATE MORE LOVE, COMPASSION AND UNDERSTANDING THEN EVER BEFORE.⁣
⁣
WE ARE PURGING THE COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS OF LIES AND ILLUSION.⁣
⁣
IT’S TIME TO DO THE WORK PEOPLE. HUMANITY WE GOT THIS!!
